release.action: Fixed IllegalArgumentException thrown when scanning DTAUS files starting with valid records but missing mandatory records at the end. Updated to latest container hooks.

Added support for the DEM currency. A space character in a DTAUS file is now taken as the DTAUS code for the DEM currency for files whose createdate is before 01/01/2002. Files with createdate after 01/01/2002 and space characters in currency fields will now lead to a PhysicalFileException. When writing DTAUS files the DTAUS code (space character) for the DEM currency is written when the currency property of Header or Transaction holds a reference to the DEM currency. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown for Header and Transaction instances with property currency set to DEM if the corresponding createdate is after 01/01/2002.
Fixed a bug where changing the create date of an A record to a value which leads to currencies of the C records getting invalid lead to invalid files.

Removed misleading error messages. If e.g. an account code field contains illegal data normally two error messages are reported. One for the illegal data and a second one for the illegal account code. The new behaviour is that if such a field is already known to not contain valid data no further checks are performed for that field any more.

Updated to new exception classes introduced in jdtaus-banking-api 1.0-beta-5. Updated the POM removing hardcoded signing aliases. Updated invalid testfiles holding the EUR currency for create dates for which the EUR currency does not exist. Updated the POM removing hardcoded signing aliases.
Removed deprecated API calls and added support for aggregated error messages introduced in jdtaus-banking-api 1.0-beta-7.
Fixed a NullPointerException thrown by class AbstractLogicalFile when validating Headers and Transactions with certain null references.
Fixed an IllegalArgumentException thrown by class DefaultPhysicalFileFactory when analyzing an empty file.
Removed depracted API calls and updated to enhanced task API introduced in jdtaus-core-api 1.0-beta-4.
